meanings.definition: A unit of energy equal to 1,000 joules.
meanings.sent1: One kilojoule is equivalent to 1,000 joules.
meanings.sent2: The snack bar contains 200 kilojoules of energy.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally ate a kilojoule bar instead of a candy bar!
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm was like a kilojoule, radiating energy all around.
meanings.sent5: The kilojoule measurement helps quantify energy in a simple way.

meanings.definition: A measure of energy content in food.
meanings.sent1: The nutrition label shows the kilojoule content of the meal.
meanings.sent2: Fruits and vegetables are rich in kilojoules.
meanings.sent3: I joked that the kilojoule in the cake would power us for days!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was a burst of kilojoule, lifting everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent5: Understanding kilojoules helps in making healthier food choices.
